entry.title: 8/10 - Bare Men: The Group Show
entry.content:
Abigail Ekue Photography

‚û° Apply


====== DESCRIPTION ======

Bare Men: The Group Show is a group photography exhibition of the male nude curated and presented by Abigail Ekue Photography. This exhibit will showcase art which celebrates all expressions of the male nude - the sensuality, strength, vulnerability and sexuality.

All genres of photography featuring the male nude will be considered -- fine art, conceptual, fashion or glamour, erotic, outdoor/nature or urban, self-portraits, dance et al. Works do not have to feature a single body/model. Work must depict men/models age 21 and over.

Photographers at any stage of their career can submit. POC and LGBTQ photographers and those that represent those populations in their work are encouraged to submit their work. The show is also open to amateurs as long as your work is presented professionally.


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

All submissions to send via this page: https://www.abigailekuephotography.com
